system.description:
While grave knights are a varied bunch, they typically share a few key beliefs in common.

  • Embrace the end. Death comes for everyone and everything. Even gods perish in time. Remember this, but also remember always that death need not be the end.
  • Terror. Few can look into the face of death without fear. The same should be true for you.
  • Endurance. Victory belongs to those who can persevere, even past the veil of mortality if need be.
